Name: Greenbelt
Ingredients: 50 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: MUDDLE grapes in base of shaker. Add pisco and elderflower liqueur, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with sparkling wine.
Review: Tastes as green and fresh as it looks. Also, floral and refreshing.
History: Created in 2007 by yours truly in London, England.
